channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
item.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”

item.title: Here’s a new way to shave hundreds of dollars off your tax bill — but it might make you feel like Scrooge on Giving Tuesday
item.description: Some people have an incentive to hold off on charitable giving until next year, in order to get the full tax reward for their generosity when new rule...

item.title: ‘She’ll let him live there for free’: My sister wants to buy our impoverished brother’s house. Is that a bad idea?
item.description: “Her only concern is that it will show up as an asset or rental property on her end.”

item.title: Bank of Japan’s Ueda rattles global bond markets with the prospect of a rate hike this month
item.description: A stronger yen and rising Japanese bond yields could pull capital away from the U.S. equity and bond markets.

item.title: Will bitcoin keep dropping? Why this technical analyst is eyeing a turnaround as soon as Tuesday.
item.description: Technical analysis suggests bitcoin could be set for a short-term reversal as early as Tuesday, signaling the recent decline may be approaching its en...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
